text: was a Japanese politician. He was a member of the Liberal Democratic Party. Yatsu was a member of the House of Representatives from 1986 until 1990 and again from 1992 until 2009. From 2000 to 2001, he was the Minister of Agriculture, Forestry and Fisheries. Yatsu was born in Tatebayashi, Japan. He died on June 3, 2021 in Tatebayashi from liver cancer, aged 86.自民党 谷津義男 元農相が死去 86歳 ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website in Japanese. title: Yoshio Yatsu
